title: TryNinja
author: TryNinja
created_time: August 19, 2023, 09:08:46 PMLast edit: August 21, 2023, 09:19:52 PM by TryNinja
content: I’m selling an esim with 5gb data valid for 30 days for only $5 $3.You need a phone that supports the esim technology (most new phones do i.e iPhones).You will receive a QR code which can be scanned with your phone, the esim will be activated right away. No need of a physical sim chip!Post here or DM me!Edit: price lowered

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: Lowering the price to $3.Turns out my iPhone doesn’t support esims since it has dual physical chip support, so I need to get rid of this. Can take pretty much any crypto.
